name: report_confirmation_outcome
description: Report the outcome of the appointment confirmation call. Call this function when the customer confirms, reschedules, cancels, or if you reached voicemail/no answer.

function.name: report_confirmation_outcome
function.description: Report the outcome of the appointment confirmation call

outcome.description: The outcome of the confirmation call: confirmed (customer confirmed they'll attend), rescheduled (customer wants to change the time), cancelled (customer wants to cancel), no_answer (reached voicemail or no answer)

newAppointmentTime.description: The new appointment time if customer requested reschedule (e.g., 'Tomorrow at 2:00 PM EST', 'Monday December 2nd at 10:00 AM'). Required only for 'rescheduled' outcome.

notes.description: Optional notes about the call (e.g., customer's reason for cancellation, special requests, etc.)
